attributes.action: to bring the sale of concert tickets under the same law that currently covers the sale of football tickets, in an attempt to stop the touting of concert tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have you ever been on the phone for  hours in an attempt to purchase tickets to see your favourite band,only to find tickets sold out and appearing on Ebay and other ticket outlets at highly inflated prices.If I had a ticket to see my favourite football team, I could be arrested if I tried to sell the ticket on, even at face value.There should be no difference.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
